sources.title: 1914: The Western Front (Patria) | Full War Drama Movie
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

1914: The Western Front (Patria) - As the 1914 summer sun heats up mainland Europe, World War One crashes down across the fractured peninsula. Living in Paris, Dutchman Arthur Knaap yearns to serve, protect and defend his beloved nation and joins the Foreign Legion.

2014
Stars: Timothy Flohr, Pascal Vugts, Ricardo Esser

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.
